original_text: quenched the fury of the flames, and escaped the edge of the sword; whose weakness was turned to strength; and who became powerful in battle and routed foreign armies.
korean_text: 불의 세력을 멸하기도 하며 칼날을 피하기도 하며 연약한 가운데서 강하게 되기도 하며 전쟁에 용감하게 되어 이방 사람들의 진을 물리치기도 하며

sentences.original_text: quenched the fury of the flames
and escaped the edge of the sword
whose weakness was turned to strength
and who became powerful in battle
